title: Test Supplementary Data
description: A questionnaire to demo using Supplementary data for placeholders, validation and routing in both repeating and non repeating sections.

contents.title: You have successfully loaded Supplementary data
contents.description: Press continue to proceed to the introduction
The purpose of this block, is to test that supplementary data loads successfully, separate to using the supplementary data

title.text: You are completing this survey for {company_name}

description.text: If the company details or structure have changed contact us on {telephone_number_link}

contents.title: Guidance for completing this survey
list: The company name, telephone number all come from supplementary data
if you picked the supplementary dataset with guidance, there will be a 3rd bullet point below this one, with the supplementary guidance.

contents.description: If you answer no, an additional block will open up allowing entering of a different email

title.text: Is {email} still the correct contact email for {company_name}?
What is the new contact email for {company_name}?
How much of the {sales} total UK sales was from Bristol and London?

question.warning: These answers must not exceed the reported total from the supplementary data

blocks.title: Total value of sales from Bristol and London is calculated to be %(total)s. Is this correct?

contents.description: You have previously reported on the above employees. Press continue to proceed to the next section where you can add any additional employees.

question.title: Do you have any additional employees to report on?

contents.description: This uses a different employees list, and the items from this list and the supplementary list will then be used in repeating sections

question.title: Do you need to add any more employees?

add_block.cancel_text: Don’t need to add any other employees?

question.title: What is the name of the employee?
What is the name of the employee?

remove_block.cancel_text: Don’t need to remove this employee?

question.title: Are you sure you want to remove this employee?
question.warning: All of the information about this employee will be deleted

contents.description: This block is enabled because there are 3 employees in the supplementary dataset

title.text: Has {employee_name} been promoted since starting at {company_name}?

contents.description: This block is enabled because there are 3 additional employees

title.text: Has {employee_name} been promoted since starting at {company_name}?

contents.description: You have previously provided information for the above products. Please press continue to proceed to questions on value and volume of sales.

title.text: Volume of production and sales for {product_name}

blocks.title: We calculate the total volume of sales over the previous quarter to be %(total)s. Is this correct?
We calculate the total volume produced over the previous quarter to be %(total)s. Is this correct?

answers.label: Value of sales from other categories

blocks.title: We calculate the total value of sales over the previous quarter to be %(total)s. Is this correct?

contents.description: The next block only shows when there are 2 products in the supplementary dataset.
This is to test that section progress updates when swapping between supplementary datasets which remove or add list items
This block is enabled because there are 2 products in the supplementary dataset

title.text: Did the total value sales of {value_sales} over the last quarter meet the target?

contents.description: The next block only shows when there are 3 products in the supplementary dataset.
This is to test that section progress updates when swapping between supplementary datasets which remove or add list items
This block is enabled because there are 3 products in the supplementary dataset

title.text: Did the total volume produced of {volume_produced} over the last quarter meet the target?
